sources.title: The Margarita Man | Full Comedy Movie | Jesse Borrego | Danny Trejo
sources.description:
***This film is under license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.***

The Margarita Man - A young man, who fears he will grow up to be like his working class father, goes to college where his love for the party gets him cut off financially and forces him to sell margaritas in order to stay in school.

2019
Stars: Danny Trejo, Jesse Borrego, Anthony Guajardo, Sean Koetting
